This entitlement works with the [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/DeclaredAgeRange] framework, which enables people to share their age range with your app.

# com.apple.developer.declared-age-range

**Property List Key**

A Boolean value indicating whether your app may request a person’s age range.

## Discussion

This entitlement works with the [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/DeclaredAgeRange] framework, which enables people to share their age range with your app.

To use Declared Age Range, add this entitlement to your app by enabling the Declared Age Range capability on your target in Xcode. For more information, refer to [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Xcode/adding-capabilities-to-your-app].
title: com.apple.developer.declared-age-range
